class.name: DojoEnum
class.brief_description: Represents an enum value from a Dojo contract.
class.description: This class holds the name and value of an enum from a Dojo contract. It's used to represent enum variants.

method.name: get_name
method.description: Returns the name of the enum variant.

method.name: get_value
method.description: Returns the value of the enum variant.

method.name: set_name
method.description: Sets the name of the enum variant.

method.name: set_value
method.description: Sets the value of the enum variant.
